sn56.96-101:1.1: … “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, appaka te satta ye chedanavadhabandhanaviparamosaalopasahasakara pativirata; atha kho eteva bahutara satta ye chedanavadhabandhanaviparamosaalopasahasakara appativirata.
sn56.96-101:2.1: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, ‘idam dukkhan’ti yogo karaniyo …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yogo karaniyo”ti.
